title: 15" X 20" Anti Static AND Heat Resistant Soldering / Hot Air Rework Mat / Pad, Upcycled, USA Made
feature: More Heat Resistant Than Vynil Mats, More Rugged Than Silicone Mats
Heat, Anti Static and Chemical Resistant, Tough Cut and Abrasion Surface
Useful for Soldering Electronics and Circuit Board Repair
description: Product is made in the USA. Upcycled / Recycled from Industrial Textiles in USA. Tests indicate suitable for use for many hot air rework procedures. Synthetic Rubber top. Back coating is non flammable and non toxic.Reviews report that solder does not stick to the mat. Soldering iron, solder and circuit board not included, for demonstration purposes only. The owner / operator of the business, Dave creates all of these himself. There is no automated machinery. Raw product goes through a labor intensive 12 step process. Dave has processed thousands like this, giving them a second life. There may be a dimple or two or a light crease, surface will be solid color. Satisfaction guaranteed. Become part of the solution, HELP US HELP THE ENVIRONMENT. Essentially the same as our other 15" X 20" Mat. Unlike the other mat this has no rebate but a lower initial price for immediate purchase.
